Text.Page: Consos Chief {@Creature:230#1047$$Nandu} welcomed you as the long-awaited fulfillment of Balder's prophecy. He gave you the key to Balder's Temple, but warned you that your trials were just beginning.

"The Sun shall await two... Through might and wisdom, they will awaken a long-lost hope." Greetings, . I have waited a long time to see you.

My parents pushed me into the archive vaults when the god Balder died. His magic preserved us to serve his refuge and temple.

Only the children survived that day."You actually saw Balder?"

I was a child, so my memories are vague. I remember he was often sad, but beautiful.

I was too young to visit the temple, but I knew the ceremonies. You have earned this key.

When you are ready, go see {@LinkCreature:230#1074$$Botak}. He will show you the entrance. Good luck.

The key! At last.

The temple entrance is in the grotto behind me. Inside the temple, you will face its {@LinkCreature:425#8005#guardian}.

I am sorry, but I do not know anything more.
